name: Hampton Inn Suites Las Vegas Airport

reviews.text: Our room was spotless, the staff friendly, and the shuttle on time with a very nice driver. The hallways and common areas were very clean as well. We will definitely stay here again when we have an early morning flight.
reviews.title: PERFECT!

reviews.text: I've stayed here twice in the past six months, and I like the close proximity to LAS. Good shuttle service, and it runs frequently. Works well if you rent a car and need a pick up at the rental facility.
reviews.title: Solid Motel - Good Proximity to LAS Airport

reviews.text: Nice rooms and the usual Hampton breakfast. I'd recommend this location and this motel.
reviews.title: Clean, big rooms, awesome service!

reviews.text: I checked in to the hotel and was pleasantly surprised to find that my room was quite large and very, very clean. Looks like new and has no odor whatsoever. It is relatively quiet for a hotel adjacent to the airport also.
reviews.title: Good choice for non-strip Vegas hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, the thermostat/heater for my room wasn't working when I arrived (it is the coldest night of the year tonight). I promptly went up to the front desk where Vickie immediately listened and dispatched Roberto to fix the problem. Roberto was at my room in less than one minute, and expertly removed the cover to the heating unit, diagnosed the problem and fixed it in less than 2 minutes. Literally, they fixed my problem in three minutes. Awesome service and great expertise. That is the kind of service you don't even get in higher end hotels. Thanks Vickie and Roberto!
reviews.title: Forget the Strip; this is a better choice
Outstanding customer service!
reviews.text: We have always enjoyed the quality and affordability that Hampton provides consistently throughout the country. This stay was no exception, and once again proved the integrity of the Hampton brand. We had some issues with the hot water in our room, and also with an understaffed breakfast crew running out of food early one morning. We mentioned it to management who were extremely gracious, appreciative, and immediately addressed both situations. They more than compensated for the inconvenience we experienced. Hats off to you Hampton for outstanding values and customer service!

Lucy, a front desk attendant, is a true professional. She will be able to tell you the best places in town to visit (and she also handles the toughest guests with charm!). Also, Yhanni, who drives the shuttle bus, is a gem. He really went out of his way to make us feel like we were the most special guests in the hotel. There is a park across the road with a huge pond--a great place to take your kids to feed the ducks, go fishing, or just take a walk. Good breakfast buffet is included. Enjoy!
reviews.title: Great Staff!

reviews.text: The staff were absolutely marvelous, beginning with helping us find the place when we became lost in our car due to a GPS that croaked. Gani went out of his way to help us with our luggage and he also kept up interesting conversations as he transported us in the motel shuttle.
reviews.title: A jewel of a hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apart from the shuttle service, the hotel is great. Their advertised shuttle service to the Strip was cut back to a one-way service between the time we made our reservation and the time we arrived (the general Hampton Inn website still says Strip shuttle service). Return taxi from Mandelay Bay is $21.
reviews.title: No Shuttle Service From Strip

reviews.text: This was my first time her and I must say that I absolutely loved the experience that I felt! The front desk staff was very friendly, rooms were just right and very clean and the complimentary breakfast was outstanding! Although, the highlight of our experience here was the extra mile shuttle driver, Gani took to make our stay even better. Not only was he very friendly and courteous but he also went the extra mile to help us with whatever we needed! Keep up the good job Gani and thank you for all the help!
reviews.title: Awesome Service!

reviews.text: Everything about this Hampton was great! We were done with our race early and couldn't check in but we were able to leave our bags there while we went to the finish line to cheer on the rest of our team. The rooms were clean and comfortable and they helped us with whatever we asked. The shuttle drive to the airport was friendly and we loved the proximity to the airport. Very close. The breakfast was great with a wide selection. I will stay here again!
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: Nice property close to airport with good meeting facility's. The breakfast was average but the staff at the breakfast was pleasant and helpful clearing my dish's as I finished. The front desk staff was very helpful. My only problem was with the shuttle to the airport. I would use this property again if the need arises.
reviews.title: Hapton Airport Los Vegas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only stayed one night. Our flight arrived in the middle of the night so I wanted a hotel close to the airport just to get as much sleep as possible before heading to the Hoover Dam the next day. This Hampton was just as good as any other Hampton. They had a clean, comfortable room with a comfortable bed. The complimentary breakfast was very good. The variety of food was good and the hot foods were tasty and hot. It's only about a 5 min. drive to the airport; a little more if you get lost. Planes are very close to the hotel when they take off from the airport. That's the only reason I did not rate it excellent, because of the airplane traffic noise. Planes started taking off around 6 AM. They are pretty loud so there was no more sleeping after that. But since we wanted to get to the Hoover Dam as early as possible that worked ok with our schedule but I would have enjoyed another hour or two of sleep. I would not have been happy to stay here any longer than one night.
reviews.title: Touring the Hoover Dam
Botched wake up service
reviews.text: Firstly, let me tell you that I am a very experienced traveler. I stay in Hilton properties throughout North America 70-90 nights a year and have done so for 25 years. When I checked in I made 2 requests... a 4:00 am wake up call and to be put on your 4:30 shuttle to the airport for my 6:10 am flight. The wake up call never came and there was no call from your front desk advising me that the wake up call was not responded to and that I missed the shuttle. I am very upset by this. I barely made it to my flight on time and was incredibly stressed. I expect a lot more from this property property.

reviews.title: great stay
reviews.text: very good stay will tell all my friends about it.This brand of hotel is great to stay at if and when you are planning a trip any where.location was very convenient for our stay and could not be any better.

Courteous staff, clean and well kept rooms, convenient walk-in showers available, very reasonably priced. Ask for a room away from the airport side if you wish to get to sleep early. The business center was convenient for flight check-in and printing boarding passes. The desk staff was helpful with restaurant recommendations.
reviews.title: Stay on the quiet side

reviews.text: If you want to stay near the airport this is a newer Hampton Inn and it shows. Excellent service and a much better than average breakfast make this a great value . The place is spotless and the front desk aims to please. Near Sunset Park.
reviews.title: Hampton Surprise

reviews.text: Went for business trip and were a group of 12 requested a curtsy ride for the group to the strip was told as soon as the shuttle comes back will be accommodated kept us waiting for about 2 hours and when asked were told the shuttle has gone back if you want we can call a cab, should have been told 2 hours before rather than keep us waiting for 2 hours to call a cab, called our cabs and paid for the cab too.
reviews.title: staff attitude

reviews.text: The entire process from check-in to check-out was as smooth as possible, the staff was friendly and very accommodating, the room was spacious and clean, and I received a call from the front desk to ensure that I was enjoying my stay. The complementary breakfast was quite comprehensive and there was also free wi-fi available in the room. The lobby was clean and welcoming, with complementary coffee, tea and hot chocolate available at all times. This was definitely a great place to stay!
reviews.title: I would recommend this hotel

reviews.text: We booked this hotel at the last minute after finding most hotels on the strip were booked or were out of our price range that night. We have previously always stayed on the strip. This hotel is in a handy location for the airport, has a large carpark and only a few minutes drive to the trips and to the south premium outlet mall. The 2x queen room we booked was great value. It was very spacious, with a huge modern bathroom and heaps of space around the beds for suitcases and shopping. The hotel is very close to the airport - but we didn't notice an noise in our room. I was impressed with the room overall.
reviews.title: Stylish and good location

aka: Hampton Inn Suites Las Vegas Airport Hotel
description: Welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport Nevada hotel where you can enjoy world-famous shows and attractions while relaxing in style. A desert bordered by the breathtaking views of the awe-inspiring Las Vegas strip it is easy to see why Las Vegas, Nevada is known as the Entertainment Capital of the World. Our city's vast number of attractions will entertain and educate you at the same time. All of this and more are at your fingertips.Our hotel is conveniently located next to McCarran International Airport and just three miles from the world-famous Strip. If you're flying in, let our complimentary airport shuttle service take care of your transporatation. Plus, enjoy a hot, fresh and complimentary breakfast each and every morning.
